name: Toxic Rupture
text: With a squeezing hand gesture, you cause internal bleeding in the target creature’s venom glands or similar organs. The target must attempt a saving throw against its own poison using the DC for this spell. If it fails, the creature is poisoned and suffers the full effect of its poison. Any subsequent saving throws that the target must attempt against the poison use the normal DC for the poison rather than this spell’s DC.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一枚蛇牙）
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效; 见文本
text_zh: 用手做出挤压的手势，你能导致目标生物的毒腺或类似器官发生内出血。目标必须使用法术DC来尝试豁免自身的毒素。如果失败，该生物就会中毒，并受到毒素的完整影响。目标所做的任何后续的对抗毒素的豁免检定都使用毒素的通常DC，而不是法术的DC。
